items: Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey
comments: Utility bill from London City Utilities is available and valid until 2023-12-31.
Data for 2020, 2021, and 2022 is available with Ellipro scores of 80, 83, and 85 respectively.
Bank and postal details including SWIFT and account number are verified.
Address matches the provided data (25 Bank Street, Canary Wharf, London, GB).
Jurisdiction is Great Britain (GB), confirmed from SQL data.
Industry License and Environmental Compliance are under review.
Scope includes investment banking, commercial banking, asset management, etc.
Two matches require additional documentation; resolution is under investigation.
Total net revenue figures for 2023, 2022, and 2021 are available in the report.
Market capitalization figures for 2023, 2022, and 2021 are reported in the annual report.
